property.name: description_key

property.name: offer_key

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft a Bee Hives (Use Queen Bee) helper on the Workbench. Select the Square Bee Hive (Use Queen Bee), and place it near your cabin. You can find a Queen Bee by harvesting trees. Add the Queen Bee to the Bee Hive to start honey comb production.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Homestead Challenge Pt.2. Add farming features around your cabin.

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft a Chicken Coops helper on the Workbench. Select the Chicken Coop - Wooden (Use 2 Chicks) and place it near your cabin. You can find Caught Chicks in birds' nests. Add 2 Caught Chicks to the Chicken Coop to start egg, feather, and domesticated chicken production. You will be rewarded with 6 seeds to populate the Farm Plots. This completes Pt.2.

property.value: Collect 250 wood, stone, and clay. Craft and place 25 frames for your horde night base foundation, and then upgrade them to wood and cobblestones. Leave room for another 25 blocks for expansion.

property.value: Collect 250 stone and 250 clay. Craft them into cobblestone shapes. Place the shapes to further expand the horde night base. The next step is an iron ladder and iron bars. You will need access to a forge for the bars.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Fort Challenge Pt.1. Begin by constructing your horde night base.

property.name: description_key
property.value: Craft 13 iron bars in the forge. Craft 3 iron ladders. Place them on your horde night base for access and line of sight. You will be rewarded with 50 concrete mix to strengthen your base. This completes Pt.1. Fort Challenge Pt.2 begins automatically after completion.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this Quest to begin the Fort Challenge Pt.2. Toughen up your horde night base.

property.name: description_key
